alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Monroe; Wilcox (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 9:11AM CST until February 23 at 7:21AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Alabama... Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam affecting Wilcox, Monroe and Clarke Counties. For the Alabama River...including Millers Ferry Dam, Claiborne Dam... Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING TO THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Alabama River Near Claiborne Dam. * WHEN...From Monday evening to Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, flooding of pastureland begins along the lower Alabama River. At 42.0 feet, water begins to inundate the Eureka Landing community. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM CST Saturday the stage was 35.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Monday evening to a crest of 43.6 feet early Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 42.0 feet. &&
